text:
Ayurveda for Balance
Medicina alternativa
Oakland, California 255 seguidores
Providing holistic and herbal therapies for all health concerns based on Ayurvedic principles.
Sobre nosotros
Living in harmony with one's own individual constitution brings optimal health and well being. Ayurveda for Balance provides ayurvedic diet and life style recommendations and herbal therapies based on an individual ayurvedic assessment of the clients constitution and existing imbalances.
